description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.YMGOKoZtKgJqIsAD]{Mechanic Trick}

With 1 minute of work, you can use your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.uWZ3LvxQ3yezLB4j]{Custom Rig (Ex)} to create a basic computer interface on a natural unworked surface, such as on the ground, a tree, or a rock face. The interface requires a power source and uses 1 charge per hour. If you are a plant creature, this instead takes a standard action and does not require a power source. The interface is attuned to unmodified material of the type on which it is placed. You know the general direction and distance of attuned materials, and you can use the interface to surveil its surroundings at distance of up to 50 feet Ã— your mechanic level. The surveillance square has ordinary vision but can see only out to 30 feet.
